name: Crypt Creepers (LEAN10 Games)
description:
Game still in development as part of a Platzi Course about 2D Videogames Programming.

To move use WASD and aim and shoot with Mouse to the little hearts.

Pick up colour balls to get Power Ups. 

You have 5 lives and lose 1 when an enemy touches you.
